description.en: Skillchain is the ultimate protocol where universities, companies, and training companies meet to certify and to guarantee the skills permanently, thanks to the blockchain technology.

ico_data.short_desc: Skillchain aims to build a world where individuals who stand out singularly for their abilities, track records and completed academic curricula are duly rewarded the roles and positions adapted to their talent and merit.
